June 21, 1930 D Redruth Contest (Junior Section)
Redruth Contest (Junior Section) 3 Test Piece Contest Redruth Contest redruth-contest-junior-section
None
The Spirit of Youth
Recreation Ground, Redruth
Prizes - 1st £6 and cup, 2nd £4, 3rd £3, 4th £2. 5 bands competed.
Oct. 22, 2013, 1:02 p.m. Dec. 6, 2018, 4:27 p.m.

4 Delabole Ex-servicemen's Silver Band W. Bufton Williams
